welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lincoln Village, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities! Get ready to experience our beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ohio State University Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Ohio State University Airport is reserved for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Columbus International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Port Columbus International Airport primarily serves Delta Airlines and their partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Port Columbus International Airport serves American Airlines and their partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Port Columbus International Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines and their partners.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free option for basic browsing and a paid option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rickenbacker Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rickenbacker Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
